PageTitle: display mpls ldp lsp statistics compatible
FuncDef: The display mpls ldp lsp statistics compatible command displays statistics about LDP LSPs.
CLIs: display mpls ldp lsp statistics compatible
Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls ldp lsp statistics compatible
An asterisk (*) before a number means the LSP is for longest-match
VPNInstanceName   Total   Ingress   Transit   Egress   Liberal  FRR
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display mpls ldp lsp statistics compatible command displays statistics about LDP LSPs. The display mpls lsp statistics command displays statistics about all types of LSPs.
